document_data.caption: Map of Torsch, along the [[Old Road (Vilhon Reach)|Old Road]].
document_data.name: Torsch
document_data.mainbody: '''Torsch''' was a settlement on [[Old Road (Vilhon Reach)|the Old Road]] bordering the southern edge of [[Chondalwood]].
document_data.Description:
Torsch stood on a trade way built in the days of young Vilhon Reach—the Old Road. The road connected Torsch to [[Elbulder]], [[Timindar]], and eventually reached the city of [[Shamph]]. The next stop to the southeast along the Old Road was [[Hardcastle (city)|Hardcastle]]. A separate road from [[Innarlith]] merged into the Old Road in Torsch.

Deep underneath Torsch laid the exact center of [[Vaerndoun]], a sprawling [[drow]] cave complex. Its winding tunnels, lakes, and caves stretched for over a hundred miles.
document_data.Government: The city was ruled by the Lord of Torsch, who served as the speaker for the Hawk Council consisting of seven local merchants.{{Cite web/theedverse/2019-01-11 - Torsch part 2}}
document_data.Trade: Through the Old Road, Torsch received trade trade from Chondath, larger Vilhon Reach, and from the [[Old Empires]].{{Cite web/theedverse/2019-01-11 - Torsch part 6}}
document_data.History: Torsch was founded by [[Aland Torsch]] of [[Tethyr]], also known as "The Hawk", in the 1200s [[DR]].
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Hidden Glades]], a temple dedicated to the god of rot, [[Moander]], located in Torsch's vicinity, shrouded by the tress of Chondalwood. The temple was led by the mistress of intrigues [[Dalchatha Maereegh]] in the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
